column2: Has any level of the [HasSpecialismColour_Ansei]Ansei§!, [HasSpecialismColour_Assassin]Assassin§!, [HasSpecialismColour_Barbarian]Barbarian§!, [HasSpecialismColour_Battlemage]Battlemage§!, [HasSpecialismColour_Crusader]Crusader§!, [HasSpecialismColour_Knight]Knight§!, [HasSpecialismColour_Rogue]Rogue§!, [HasSpecialismColour_Scout]Scout§!, [HasSpecialismColour_Spellsword]Spellsword§! or [HasSpecialismColour_Swordsinger]Swordsinger§! specialisation
